Our Client's Valuable Feedback

It's a top-quality professional company that found us our new apartment on the same day and fixed the contract in a couple of hours. He fully kept us in the loop. We wouldnt hesitate to use him and ModCASA properties again. Hes the downtown specialist. 5 stars!
by Daniyal Ahmed
I want to say thank you to Mr. Haris bin Khalid, a highly professional Real Estate Agent who listened to my wants and needs. He was very friendly and with his help in my very special situation, I was able to find an apartment for rent just in a few days. I would definitely recommend Haris as an amazing real estate agent.
by Jason Farr
Mr. Shafqat from the Sales department at ModCASA Properties was extremely helpful, professional, and flexible when searching for a new rental home for me. His experience meant he didn't waste my time and only showed me apartments that fitted my budget and location preferences. Fantastic service!
by Mohamed Faraz Osman
We recently purchased a property and had Mr. Khalid from ModCASA Properties acting as our purchase agent. Khalid was absolutely wonderful in the whole process, from finding us properties, meeting us at inspections, and generally helping in the process of purchasing a property here in Dubai. I would highly recommend Mr. Muhammad Khalid and his team.
by James Plant
